page.title: 12BARCOMBE'S LOCAL POLICEMAN.
page.content: {REPORT BY CLASS 1. Mr Knott is the local policeman.He lives in the police house which has been there since 1930. He likes being a policeman in Barcombe rather than in a large town,because he and his family feel part of the community.Whereas in a town he is just a number or someone in a uniform.He is very happy in Barcombe. The average crime rates for the Barcombe area varies.1984 was a bad year for Barcombe itself with many burglaries.There were about 40 to 50 crimes in Barcombe,Offham,Hamsey and Cooksbridge. There is also the new Neighbourhood Crime Watch scheme.
